title: AG Adriano Goldschmied Men's Everett Slim Straight Jeans 34"
description: The Everett Slim Straight features a slim straight cut in a comfortable mid-rise waist that’s relaxed from hip to the knee before slightly tapering at the leg opening.
Day to night versatility; soft and smooth hand; ultra-fine yarns; peached finish.
Produced using sustainable ingredients and recycled water.
The Everett Slim Straight features a slim straight cut in a comfortable mid-rise waist that’s relaxed from hip to the knee before slightly tapering at the leg opening.
